Information
Upgrading Event: Every day at 18:00 and 20:00 server time, a zone opens, which you can enterthrough Alt + B or me and get Upgrading Coin from monsters, as well as useful items for improving your character. The duration of the event is 60 minutes. To receive power-ups, the faction must capture the artifact in the center of the zone.
TvT Event, CtF Event: Every 30 minutes, registration for participation in the event starts. After registration, the factions move to the zone where they need to kill each other or capture flags.
TvT and CtF rewards
Winners reward: Adena [150] 100% Battle Coin [10] 100% Sealed Rune Lv.3 [5] 60% Knight's Epaulettes [1] 30% Epic Stone [1] 35% Buff Coin 6 hours [1] 3% Rune Adena 3 hours [1] 3%
Losers reward: Adena [50] 100% Battle Coin [5] 30% Sealed Rune Lv.3 [3] 30% Buff Coin 6 hours [1] 1%
